title: New Client Bugging
body: Whenever get to the login screen for the new client and attempt to move the client part of the screen is cut off. What do I do? Is it because of my laptop or does it happen to all laptops? Please help it affects the game and doesn't allow me to play.

replies.body: It sounds like you've got an oversized client screen.  Try tapping Ctrl + Down Arrow on your keyboard while the client is up.  Let me know if that helps!
Thank you so much, it worked perfectly
